```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(foreign)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

### Import

```{r}
LegResults <- read.dta("032_StateLegForecast_CAcopy/SLERs1967to2015_20160912b_CA.dta")
threeoffices9008 <- read_excel("032_StateLegForecast_CAcopy/aaa_All_States_1968_2010_2013_03_22_CAonly.xlsx")
threeoffices9002 <- read_excel("032_StateLegForecast_CAcopy/AK_CA_Districts_1968_2010_2012_01_18_CAonly.xlsx")
```

### Tidy

```{r}
# Selecting variables of interest (only old variables)
LegResults <- LegResults %>%
  select(caseid, v05, v06, v06b, v07, v09, v09z, 21:33, 35, v43, v53, v56, v57, v58)
# Selecting variables of interest for the database of results for 3 offices
threeoffices9002 <- threeoffices9002 %>%
  select(-(11:13))
threeoffices9008 <- threeoffices9008 %>%
  select(1:4, 6:9, 11, 12, 15, 16)
```
